Readout device info.SYNTAX: echo " ARCH=$(uname -m) IP=$(ifconfig wlan0 |grep 'inet addr' |cut -d ':' -f2 |cut -d ' ' -f1 && ifconfig eth0 |grep 'inet addr' |cut -d ':' -f2 |cut -d ' ' -f1) madROM=$(cat /sdcard/madversion 2>/dev/null || echo unknown) VMscript=$(grep '# version' /system/bin/vmapper.sh | awk '{ print $NF }') 55vmapper=$(head -5 /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper | grep '# version' | awk '{ print $NF }') POGO=$(dumpsys package com.nianticlabs.pokemongo | grep versionName | head -n1 | sed 's/ *versionName=//') RGC=$(dumpsys package de.grennith.rgc.remotegpscontroller | grep versionName | head -n1 | sed 's/ *versionName=//') MITM=$(ps | grep -e de.goldjpg.vmapper -e com.mad.pogodroid | awk -F. '{ print $NF }') PD=$(dumpsys package com.mad.pogodroid | grep versionName | head -n1 | sed 's/ *versionName=//') VMAPPER=$(dumpsys package de.goldjpg.vmapper | grep versionName | head -n1 | sed 's/ *versionName=//') "

Readout VM settings.SYNTAX:
echo "autoupdate=$([ -f /sdcard/disableautovmapperupdate ] && echo disabled || echo enabled) " && print ' ' && awk -F'["]+' '/value/{print $2 "=" $4}' /data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/shared_prefs/config.xml |tr '
' ' ' && awk -F'[<>"]+' '/string/{print $3 "=" $4}' /data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/shared_prefs/config.xml |tr '
' ' '

vm: experimental vhook enable.SYNTAX: vmconf="/data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/shared_prefs/config.xml" && sed -i 's,"betamode" value="false","betamode" value="true",g' "$vmconf" && chmod 660 "$vmconf" && vmuser=$(ls -la /data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/|head -n2|tail -n1|awk '{print $3}') && chown "$vmuser":"$vmuser" "$vmconf" && reboot

vm: experimental vhook disable.SYNTAX: vmconf="/data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/shared_prefs/config.xml" && sed -i 's,"betamode" value="true","betamode" value="false",g' "$vmconf" && chmod 660 "$vmconf" && vmuser=$(ls -la /data/data/de.goldjpg.vmapper/|head -n2|tail -n1|awk '{print $3}') && chown "$vmuser":"$vmuser" "$vmconf" && reboot
